metadata.title: CVE-2024-42329 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: The webdriver for the Browser object expects an error object to beinitialized when the webdriver_session_query function fails. But thisfunction can fail for various reasons without an error description and thenthe wd->error will be NULL and trying to read from it will result in acrash.

criterions.comment: zabbix package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
